title: Ather Energy partners HDFC Bank, IDFC First Bank to offer retail finance for its e-scooter - Moneycontrol
content: Ather Energy partners HDFC Bank, IDFC First Bank to offer retail finance for its e-scooter  Moneycontrol
description: The collaboration will allow Ather Energy customers to avail instant loans from the two private lenders at low-interest rates and with a maximum LTV (Loan-to-value), a release said.
